articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: West Side Story trailer: Steven Spielberg’s 2021 remake is here - Polygon
articles.description: Steven Spielberg’s West Side Story remake staring Ansel Elgort and Rachel Zegler got its first trailer during the 93rd Academy Awards. The trailer shows off some of the movie’s epic musical numbers and pays tribute to the original 1961 movie.
articles.content: The remake is finally on its way after a year delay
